item.title: Discovering a Delete-Your-Files-and-Run Level Bug in debtap
item.description: A deep-dive investigation into the Arch Linux tool debtap reveals how a well-intentioned typo fix accidentally activated a catastrophic rm -rf bug that deleted all files in the current working directory.

item.title: Troubleshooting a Stubborn DMIC on a ThinkBook 16 G7+ ASP with Linux
item.description: Detailed troubleshooting process for fixing a silent digital microphone on a Lenovo ThinkBook 16 G7+ ASP (AMD Ryzen AI 9) laptop running Linux, primarily resolved by adding the kernel module parameter options snd_sof_amd_common enable_pdm=1.
